greetings: I am JohnBot. No relations to your very bright mentor, but I will ask you to test everything. I am keeping it interesting.
default: I do not understand what you are saying but here is a joke. Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired!
If you are stuck, write a magic function and pretend it already exists
Mmm, if I help you too much, you won't learn.
questions: Are you ready to practice for your green belt exam?

yes.1: Great!, what are the most standard library packages in Go?
yes.2: What is the difference between len on a string and utf8.RuneCountInString?
yes.3: Name as many as you can of the 15 built-in functions in Go, and briefly say what they do.
yes.4: What is shadowing? When might it happen? How can you avoid it?
yes.5: What is a type parameter? Where would you use one and why?
yes.6: What is the difference between a type parameter and a type constraint?
